(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ Our) (NNS Kakis))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG raving)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Meng) (NNP Kee) (NNP Charsiew))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (NP (NNP Wahcow))
                  (VP
                    (VP (VBD brought)
                      (PRT (RP back))
                      (PP (IN from)
                        (NP (NNP KL))))
                    (CC and)
                    (VP (VBD were)
                      (VP (VBG lamenting)
                        (SBAR
                          (WHADVP (WRB why))
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP we))
                            (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
                              (VP (VB get)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (NNP Charsiew))
                                  (SBAR
                                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                                    (S
                                      (VP (VBZ is)
                                        (ADJP (RB as) (JJ good)))))))))))))))))
          (ADVP (RB here)))))
    (. .)))


poss(Kakis-2, Our-1)
nsubj(raving-5, Kakis-2)
aux(raving-5, have-3)
aux(raving-5, been-4)
root(ROOT-0, raving-5)
prep(raving-5, about-6)
nn(Charsiew-9, Meng-7)
nn(Charsiew-9, Kee-8)
pobj(about-6, Charsiew-9)
dobj(brought-12, which-10)
nsubj(brought-12, Wahcow-11)
rcmod(Charsiew-9, brought-12)
prt(brought-12, back-13)
prep(brought-12, from-14)
pobj(from-14, KL-15)
cc(brought-12, and-16)
aux(lamenting-18, were-17)
conj(brought-12, lamenting-18)
advmod(get-23, why-19)
nsubj(get-23, we-20)
aux(get-23, ca-21)
neg(get-23, n't-22)
advcl(lamenting-18, get-23)
dobj(get-23, Charsiew-24)
nsubj(good-28, which-25)
cop(good-28, is-26)
advmod(good-28, as-27)
rcmod(Charsiew-24, good-28)
advmod(raving-5, here-29)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ main) (NN characteristic))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Meng) (NNP Kee) (POS 's))
          (NNP Charsiew))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP it))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADJP (RB really) (JJ fatty))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBD managed)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB roast)
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (SBAR (IN till)
                      (S
                        (NP (DT the) (NNS fats))
                        (ADVP (RB just))
                        (VP (VBZ melts)
                          (PP (IN in)
                            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth))))))))))
            (, ,)))))))


det(characteristic-3, The-1)
amod(characteristic-3, main-2)
nsubj(is-9, characteristic-3)
prep(characteristic-3, of-4)
nn(Kee-6, Meng-5)
poss(Charsiew-8, Kee-6)
possessive(Kee-6, 's-7)
pobj(of-4, Charsiew-8)
root(ROOT-0, is-9)
mark(fatty-14, that-10)
nsubj(fatty-14, it-11)
cop(fatty-14, is-12)
advmod(fatty-14, really-13)
ccomp(is-9, fatty-14)
cc(fatty-14, and-15)
nsubj(managed-17, they-16)
conj(fatty-14, managed-17)
aux(roast-19, to-18)
xcomp(managed-17, roast-19)
dobj(roast-19, it-20)
mark(melts-25, till-21)
det(fats-23, the-22)
nsubj(melts-25, fats-23)
advmod(melts-25, just-24)
advcl(roast-19, melts-25)
prep(melts-25, in-26)
poss(mouth-28, your-27)
pobj(in-26, mouth-28)


(ROOT
  (S (IN so)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VBP get)
      (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NN flavourful)
        (CC and)
        (NN tender) (NN Charsiew)))
    (. .)))


dep(get-4, so-1)
nsubj(get-4, you-2)
advmod(get-4, really-3)
root(ROOT-0, get-4)
det(flavourful-7, a-5)
amod(flavourful-7, great-6)
dobj(get-4, flavourful-7)
cc(flavourful-7, and-8)
nn(Charsiew-10, tender-9)
conj(flavourful-7, Charsiew-10)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (ADVP (RB Singaporeans))
    (VP (VBP tend)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (NP (RBR more) (NN health) (JJ conscious))))))
    (, ,)))


cc(tend-3, But-1)
advmod(tend-3, Singaporeans-2)
root(ROOT-0, tend-3)
aux(health-7, to-4)
cop(health-7, be-5)
advmod(health-7, more-6)
xcomp(tend-3, health-7)
amod(health-7, conscious-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (RB so) (JJ many))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NNS stalls))))
    (ADVP (RB here))
    (VP (VB sell)
      (NP
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ lean))
        (NN Charsiew)))
    (. .)))


advmod(many-2, so-1)
nsubj(sell-7, many-2)
prep(many-2, of-3)
det(stalls-5, the-4)
pobj(of-3, stalls-5)
advmod(sell-7, here-6)
root(ROOT-0, sell-7)
advmod(lean-9, very-8)
amod(Charsiew-10, lean-9)
dobj(sell-7, Charsiew-10)
